page.title: 05TOURISM
page.content: Tenterden itself is fast becoming a town to be visited by holiday makers, and local people have a job to find a parking space even in the car parks during the height of the summer season. The new Traffic Warden gets finger cramp from writing out so many parking penalty tickets.There is a recreation ground opposite the school with swings, a slide and a roundabout; there is also a bowling green and football pitch plus tennis courts but Tenterden desperately needs an indoor sports centre as the young people have little to do in the evenings.
